newsitem.title: USA: New York physical copper market - Aug 18.
newsitem.headline: New York physical copper market - Aug 18.

text.p: Based on COMEX settlement prices, merchant copper cathodes for August shipment were quoted at a nominal 98.75 to 99.00 cents a lb.
Dealers quoted No.2 scrap copper at a nominal 78.50 cents per lb, down 2.50 cents from August 15th. ((New York Commodity Desk, 212-859-1640))
